sentences.en: ...growing up in a male-only household.
sentences.cn: …在全体成员均为男性的家庭里长大。

sentences.en: ...household chores.
sentences.cn: …家务活。

sentences.en: A growing number of households have at least one computer.
sentences.cn: 越来越多的家庭拥有至少一台电脑。

sentences.en: a sale of miscellaneous household items
sentences.cn: 各种生活用品大减价

sentences.en: Computers have become household toys.
sentences.cn: 计算机已成了家庭的消遣玩意儿。

sentences.en: Cooking, sewing, and house keeping are household arts.
sentences.cn: 煮饭 、 缝衣和料理家务都是持家的艺术.

sentences.en: Families are classified by the occupation of the head of the household (= the person who earns the most money and is most respected in a house ) .
sentences.cn: 家庭按一家之主的职业来分类。

sentences.en: Formerly most of our household utensils were made of brass.
sentences.cn: 以前我们家庭用的器皿多数是用黄铜做的.

sentences.en: He is doing household chores.
sentences.cn: 他正在做家务.

sentences.en: household chores
sentences.cn: 家务杂活

sentences.en: Josh expects me to manage all the household expenses on very little.
sentences.cn: 乔希指望我对每笔家庭支出都精打细算。

sentences.en: Leaflets have been delivered to every household.
sentences.cn: 传单已发送到每家每户。

sentences.en: Most households now own at least one car.
sentences.cn: 大多数家庭现在至少有一辆汽车。

sentences.en: My agent told me, "This'll make your name a household word."
sentences.cn: 我的经纪人告诉我：“这将使你一举成名。”

sentences.en: My household duties were not particularly onerous.
sentences.cn: 我的家务活并不繁重.

sentences.en: She became a household name in the 1960s.
sentences.cn: 她在20世纪60年代成为家喻户晓的人物。

sentences.en: Telephone is now a household necessity.
sentences.cn: 现在电话是一种家庭必需品.

sentences.en: The peasant household has become prosperous through working hard.
sentences.cn: 这户农家已经通过勤劳变得兴旺发达了.

sentences.en: The product's name became a household word.
sentences.cn: 这个产品的名字已家喻户晓.

sentences.en: The twins endorsed a line of household cleaning products.
sentences.cn: 那对双胞胎为一系列家用清洁产品做广告。

sentences.en: Who makes the financial decisions in your household?
sentences.cn: 你家里谁管钱？

phrases.tran_cn: 家庭收入；家庭总入息；住户收入
家喻户晓的人；家喻户晓的事
家喻户晓的单词；众所周知的词

trans.tran_en: relating to looking after a house and the people in it

trans.tran_cn: 家庭，同住一所房子的人
trans.tran_en: all the people who live together in one house
